text: Mighty Jaffar lies dead once again. For how long, no one knows for certain...
Whether he was slain by an enemy or undone by his own Djinn slaves remains unknown, but the Golden Magus will no longer plague the seas with his cruel petulance and eccentricity.
Twice a ruler, twice a failure. Princess Fatandira has learned the hard way that the crown will never be her destiny.
